sentences.en: A term in prison will concentrate his mind wonderfully.
sentences.cn: 一想到要被判刑，他的头脑就会变得非常清醒。

sentences.en: Adrian was finding it difficult to concentrate.
sentences.cn: 阿德里安觉得自己很难集中注意力。

sentences.en: Construction of the aircraft is being concentrated at Prestwick.
sentences.cn: 飞机制造正在向普雷斯特威克集中。

sentences.en: He scrunched up his face, trying to concentrate.
sentences.cn: 他皱起眉头努力集中精神.

sentences.en: He slept badly at night and couldn't concentrate in class at daytime.
sentences.cn: 他夜里睡不好,白天上课时思想开小差.

sentences.en: Her inability to concentrate could cause an accident.
sentences.cn: 她无法集中精力可能会导致事故。

sentences.en: I can't concentrate with all that noise going on.
sentences.cn: 吵闹声不绝于耳，我无法集中精神。

sentences.en: If you don't concentrate more on your work you'll be dismissed.
sentences.cn: 假如你不更加专心地工作,你将被解雇.

sentences.en: Italian industry is concentrated mainly in the north.
sentences.cn: 意大利的工业主要集中在北部。

sentences.en: Now please concentrate.
sentences.cn: 现在请集中注意力。

sentences.en: orange juice made from concentrate
sentences.cn: 用浓缩橙汁冲兑的橙汁

sentences.en: The general decided to concentrate his forces near the capital.
sentences.cn: 这位将军决定把他的部队集中在首都附近.

sentences.en: The group plans to concentrate on six core businesses.
sentences.cn: 该集团打算主营6种业务。

sentences.en: They should concentrate on rejuvenating the existing vegetation, like grass and shrubs.
sentences.cn: 他们应该侧重于修整现有的绿化植被，比如草和灌木。

sentences.en: They will concentrate on teaching the basics of reading, writing and arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 他们将集中教授阅读、写作和算术基础知识。

sentences.en: Water companies should concentrate on reducing waste instead of building new reservoirs.
sentences.cn: 自来水公司应该集中精力减少水浪费，而不是修建新水库。

sentences.en: We must concentrate our efforts on finding ways to reduce costs.
sentences.cn: 我们要集中精力找出降低成本的办法.

sentences.en: We must concentrate our energies on treating addiction first.
sentences.cn: 我们必须首先集中精力治疗毒瘾。

sentences.en: We need to concentrate on our target audience, namely women aged between 20 and 30.
sentences.cn: 我们须针对我们的听众对象，即年龄在20到30岁之间的妇女。

sentences.en: When working, one should concentrate and not allow oneself to be distracted.
sentences.cn: 工作时要集中精力,不要分心.

words.tran_cn: 集中的；浓缩的；全神贯注的
浓度；集中；浓缩；专心；集合

phrases.tran_cn: 集中精力于；全神贯注于
大豆浓缩蛋白；[医]浓缩大豆蛋白

trans.tran_en: a substance or liquid which has been made stronger by removing most of the water from it

trans.tran_cn: 全神贯注，使集中，使浓缩
trans.tran_en: to think very carefully about something that you are doing

trans.tran_cn: 全神贯注，全力以赴；集中，聚集
trans.tran_en: to be present in large numbers or amounts somewhere, or to cause people or things to be present in large numbers or amounts somewhere
to think very carefully about something that you are doing
